CustomField.description: This is the RICHEY MAY EMPLOYEE who originated the lead - aka the first person to talk to them. This is likely to be the same as lead owner, but doesn't have to be.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the RICHEY MAY EMPLOYEE who originated the lead - aka the first person to talk to them. This is likely to be the same as lead owner, but doesn't have to be.
CustomField.label: Lead Originator
